title: Jimmy Thackery + The Drivers - As Live As It Gets (2012) [FLAC]
description:
Jimmy Thackery & The Drivers feat. JP Soars & The Hydraulic Horns - As Live As It Gets
Label: White River Records - WWR1921
Format: 2 x CD, Album, Live Recording
Country: US
Released: 2012
Genre: Blues
Style: Modern Electric Blues, Blues Rock

Recorded live at the 2011 October Pacific Cruise


Tracklist:

CD1
01. A Letter to My Girlfriend
02. Blind Man in the Night
03. Gangster of Love
04. Gypsy Woman
05. Kickin' Chicken

CD2
01. Feel the Heat
02. The Hustle (Is On)
03. Hobart's Blues
04. I've Been Down So Long


Lineup:

Jimmy Thackery - guitars, vocals
Mark Bumgarner - bass
George Sheppard - drums
JP Soars - guitar, vocals
Joe McGlohon - tenor sax
Jim Spake - baritone sax
